title: BCBGMAXAZRIA Watch Face
description: BCBGMAXAZRIA, named for the Parisian slang term “bon chic, bon genre,” meaning “good style, good attitude,” unveils a collection of custom watch faces for Android Wear devices, created in collaboration with the CFDA and Google Play. The square and round faces evoke BCBGMAXAZRIA’S signature aesthetic—a timeless blend of European sophistication with an American spirit.FEATURES:• The BCBGMAXAZRIA watch face styles are available in a curated selection of nine customizable colors: silver, rose gold, gun metal, white, nude, denim, burgundy, black and white, and gold.• The BCBGMAXAZRIA styles feature a digital face with a date display.Note: All faces work on round and square devices. Please update to Android 5.0 before installing.
descriptionHTML:
BCBGMAXAZRIA, named for the Parisian slang term “bon chic, bon genre,” meaning “good style, good attitude,” unveils a collection of custom watch faces for Android Wear devices, created in collaboration with the CFDA and Google Play. The square and round faces evoke BCBGMAXAZRIA’S signature aesthetic—a timeless blend of European sophistication with an American spirit.

FEATURES:
• The BCBGMAXAZRIA watch face styles are available in a curated selection of nine customizable colors: silver, rose gold, gun metal, white, nude, denim, burgundy, black and white, and gold.
• The BCBGMAXAZRIA styles feature a digital face with a date display.

Note: All faces work on round and square devices. Please update to Android 5.0 before installing.
comments: Creative watch face This watch face is full of imagination. Unlike other functional watch face, I like this more. Of course, Watch Face - fuji is the  best watch face I have ever seen . Great animation!
Great job! Nice watch face which I could wear all the time. I rarely My  change watch face. Last watch face named watch face of ben on my wrist for a real long time
Kinda lame Looks good the first time then gets boring.
Add the date other then that it's a clean watch face
Kind of wish the ambient mode watch face was an option as the main watchface
